user_query: I'm planning a vacation to a tropical destination with my family. Can you recommend some popular tourist attractions and restaurants in the area? Also, provide me with the current weather forecast and the top hotels available in that location.

TaskList.description: Gather popular tourist attractions in the tropical destination.
Retrieve a list of recommended restaurants in the tropical destination.
Fetch the current weather forecast for the tropical destination.
List the top hotels available in the tropical destination.
